bg.x2d.physics

Class StandardPhysics

  • java.lang.Object
    • bg.x2d.physics.StandardPhysics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PhysicsNode

    public class StandardPhysics
extends Object
implements PhysicsNode
    A PhysicsNode that represents standard (real) physical forces acting upon an object. Gravity is built in and will always be called by applyForces.
    Author:
    Brian Groenke

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface bg.x2d.physics.PhysicsNode

        PhysicsNode.Collision

      protected boolean applyGravity
      configurable only by subclasses to toggle gravity - gravity will always be applied within a StandardPhysics object
